Futuramerlin.com is a temporary Web site for the Ember project. "Ember" is the current working name for a project to develop and facilitate 􍁝􋶀󼷢󺀊󸥎􈺍󲋠􏺐collaboration on a 􃭡􏿭specification􃭠􏿭󼅹󴶯􈡺󿔊􆲦􍸂󲀰􏼝, a library, and a model community, to serve as resources and infrastructure for innovative communities. The primary components comprising the project are currently unfinished, but a variety of software maintained to facilitate the development of the project is available.
